Question: This person's performance in the film foreshadowed his role as Jim Stark in Rebel Without A Cause.
Hints: This person was told that the Lotus delivery would be delayed until the fall.
On the sitcom Happy Days, Fonzie has a picture of this person in his closet next to his mirror.
James Byron **** (February 8, 1931 – September 30, 1955) was an American actor.
